sentences.sContent: Subjects or participants - Who will take part in your study ?
sentences.sCn: 研究对象或参与者――谁将会参与你的研究？

sentences.sContent: Students should do surveys, visit museums, take part in charity work and hand in reports for teachers to decide on their marks.
sentences.sCn: 学生应该通过做调查，参观博物馆，参加公益劳动，上交给老师的这些活动的报告，决定他们的成绩。

sentences.sContent: Synchronous serve and asynchronous receive can be particularly useful in cases where external clients take part in application processing by sending messages to the application.
sentences.sCn: 如果外部客户端通过向应用程序发送消息来参与应用程序处理，同步服务和异步接收将尤为有用。
